divs: Sighting DetailsAround 5 or 6 years ago I was outside in my backyard in west central Ohio on a sunny day, and happened to look up and saw something reflecting high in the sky towards the south west, so I got out my binoculars and saw a round cylinder shaped metalic object. I then got out my camcorder and recorded it, and zoomed in on it, and had to put it on my tripod to get a good image of it. I still have it. It was in daylight, and just seemed to be floating high in the sky. I have looked at it different times since then, and have no idea what it was. Any ideas? Thanks
